name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: Experience high-fidelity sound with our premium noise-cancelling headphones. Designed for comfort and long-lasting battery life.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Work in comfort with this fully adjustable ergonomic chair. Breathable mesh and lumbar support included.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health and workouts with precision. Features heart rate monitoring, GPS, and sleep tracking.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Tactile and responsive mechanical switches for the ultimate typing experience. customizable RGB lighting.
